_header: Through a town as I come ride
Subjects: tongue, advice concerning use of; advice, moral
_description: ‘Hyre & see and say not all’ — one twelve-line and seven eight-line stanzas including refrain, ‘Hyre & se and sey not all’

CamTCC1450.First Lines:
Throwe a towne as y com rydey sawe wretyn on a
                    wall…
CamTCC1450.Last Lines:
…There for y rede thynke on thys thyngehyre and se and sey not
                    all
CamTCC1450.Editions:
Sandison,  Helen Estabrook. 
             The ‘Chanson d’Aventure’ in Middle English.
Bryn Mawr College Monographs,  Monograph Series 12. Bryn Mawr, PA: Bryn Mawr College, 1913: 121-3.
